text: niccayamaka vanankalaiyum, pumiyaiyum, malaikalaiyum (nam kattalaikalana) amanitattai cumantu kollumaru etuttukkattinom, anal atai cumantukkolla avai maruttana, ataipparri avai ancina. (Anal) manitan atai cumantan. Niccayamaka manitan (tanakkuttane) aniyayam ceypavanakavum ariviliyakavum irukkinran
